p: The ash content of all samples were statistically found different (p<0.05) ( Table 2). The reason for the differences between the results might be owing to the different carrier agents used in this study. The highest ash content was determined in sample 2 (1.66%) and the lowest ash content was observed in sample 1 (0.37%). Caliskan and Dirim (2016) determined that ash content of sumac extract powders varied from 2.46% to 4.22% that depend on high total soluble solid content of sumac extract (12.4 Â°Bx).
